ai-atk-abh03a16:1_2: Herein, there is in the past, future or present, and present in terms of the past, future or present.
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_3: So it’s not appropriate for you to get all these things that we call it collapsesed at blind.
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_4: (but) they are included in the past, future and present in their own doctrine,
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_5: ‘No, there is no causality left over those who speak in others.’
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_7: Then the Sakyan said to him: “He who speaks like this, there is nothing that can be like that. There is no causality. There is nothing wrong with them, I say.”
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_8: For the other in that place where there is no friend, there is no scorning to which it was,
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_9: There is no second question that can be referred to others.
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_10: Yet there is no place here when something is profitable. When it is asked, there is no inclination for one who has no secretion such.
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_11: The meaning should be understood according to whichever, in all places is the meaning.
ai-atk-abh03a16:1_12: Sunking, “Well, there is because in the past,” those who say, “This is lost opposite sex,” etc., were those who do not practice absorption in the past. And those who were failed to because of this, they too quickly got to do so; for those who speak to absentity or to an end.
